title.rendered: Best time to invest in premium floors, affordable housing and in residential plots; Signature Global brings all this at reasonable prices amidst shooting property prices in Gurugram

content.rendered:
Save the time, save money and buy comfort of living and all is possible in Gurugram’s new sectors these days and time is apt now because land, plot, and the property prices are going higher and higher with every passing day. In the lap of the beautiful forest of Aravalli, Signature Global has come up with premium independent floors, affordable housing and residential plots all at reasonable prices with all comforts of living in bonus – a wonderful road and rail connectivity and greenery and natural beauty in sector 79-B.


Road infrastructure is the lifeline of a city since commuting is the first and foremost factor involved around which the rest other factors determine the development in an area and Signature Global has delivered its commitments and maintained its integrity in all its projects until now in Gurugram, and rated best among the promoters in the state. Road infrastructure or connectivity is an important factor: two wheeler four wheeler or light and heavy vehicles reach a site where you plan to buy or invest in properties brings you instant relief if it is fantastic and then only you start calculating for other subsequent reliefs like schools, hospitals, bus and railway stations, local transport system, shops and markets and then commuting from home to office and vice versa. This way Gurugram has left behind many cities of India thanks to its beautiful location, proximity to national capital and superb prospective economic growth and Signature Global is one dedicated real estate promoter.


In brief, let’s understand it. After developing 57 sectors, the Haryana government realised the potential of Gurugram and planned for a circular road on the line of Delhi’s ring road and thus SPR-NPR came into the picture. Almost circular SPR-NPR together is the spine of the city with NH 48 at its centre separating the city in two parts. So, the idea of the state government is/was to create seamless road connectivity to ease out intra-city commuting as well as intra-NCR commuting and to minimize travel time with the national capital, especially with international airports. The Haryana government in 2006/07 planned for a 210 metre wide and 18km long northern peripheral road to build and complete the planned circular path in continuation with the SPR and thus new master plans got prepared and it accelerated the growth in leaps and bounds. The Haryana government planned for a second phase of Gurugram Sectors 58 to 115 and granted licences to promoters including licence for affordable housing. And Gurugram by now emerged as the economic capital of the state and prime destination in terms of investment in any manner. The property prices have gone many times since then.


Close proximity of Sectors 92 and 93 with the Dwarka expressway is likely to shorten its distance with the national capital and international airport – prices of lands or plots have gone up many times in recent years only with announcements of NHAI taking over the Dwarka expressway. Prior to NHAI taking over NPR from the Haryana government, its construction was stuck in land litigation that affected the real estate market in these areas. Now, it (Dwarka expressway) is expected to be operational anytime this year and it is a perfect time one should invest into plots, premium floors, affordable housing or individual floors. Dwarka expressway is almost complete and anytime in the next five six months it may be opened for the traffic and it is going to smooth in terms of traffic movement in the NCR.


Signature Global has made a new era in value homes at many new sectors in decades and come up with such value homes at Sector- 93 where it has set a benchmark in premium lifestyle with excellent planning, superlative designing, and perfect space management. Developed in conjunction with the government of Haryana, Signature Global’s Orchard Avenue – is a perfect match of property seekers’ budget with high-quality finishes, fittings, and finest amenities. Centrally located and seamlessly connected to all the prime destinations only 20 minutes from the national capital and international airport.
